name: The Plumber
description: The wool felt mustache on this cozy fleece neck warmer is perfect to wear when you're outside jumping on to mushrooms, punching blocks, and collecting coins! 'Stache 5mm thick black wool felt, approximately 5" from tip to tip and about 1.5" high. Size Approximately 9" high and 22" around. One size fits almost everyone. Suitable for men or women. Color & Construction Two tone (red and flesh*) with a black mustache. The red is in back and the flesh color tapers along your jawline. Handmade from two layers of fleece for extra warmth and reversibility. *your flesh may vary, color match not guaranteed.

name: The Archvillain
description: The wool felt mustache on this cozy fleece neck warmer is attached down the middle and partway across the top, but the ends are free for dastardly twirling while you tie helpless maidens to the railroad tracks. 'Stache 5mm thick black wool felt, approximately 3.5" from tip to tip and about 1.5" high. Size Approximately 9" high and 22" around. One size fits almost everyone. Suitable for men or women. Color & Construction Two tone (charcoal and flesh*) with a black mustache. The gray is in back and the flesh color tapers along your jawline. Handmade from two layers of fleece for extra warmth and reversibility. *your flesh may vary, color match not guaranteed.

name: The Revolutionary

name: The Magnum
description: You might not need this cozy fleece neck warmer on the Hawaiian beaches, but the wind can really pick up when you've got the top down in your Ferarri. Did you see my mustache this morning, Ivan? 'Stache Brown fleece, approximately 3.5" from tip to tip and about 1.5" high. Attached at the top and sides, but open on the bottom for volume. Handmade, so there may be slight variations from the picture. Size Approximately 9" high and 22" around. One size fits almost everyone. Suitable for men or women. Color & Construction Two tone (charcoal and flesh*) with a brown mustache. The gray is in back and the flesh color tapers along your jawline. Handmade from two layers of fleece for extra warmth and reversibility. *your flesh may vary, color match not guaranteed.
